property.name: Rules
property.value: (X), Flip Boris Brightbeard: Boris heals X damage from target hero or ally. Use only on your turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (3), Flip Dizdemona, put X damage on her: Dizdemona deals X shadow damage to target ally. Use only on your turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (1), Flip Elendril: Your Ranged weapons have +3 ATK this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (3), Flip Graccus: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target hero or ally this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (2), Flip Litori Frostburn: Target hero or ally can't attack this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (3), Flip Moonshadow: Shuffle your hand into your deck, then draw that many cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (5), Flip Timmo Shadestep: Destroy target exhausted ally. Use only on your turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (1), Flip Warrax: Warrax has protector this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (1), Flip Gorebelly:You pay (3) less the next time you strike with a Melee weapon this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (5), Flip Grennan Stormspeaker: Grennan deals 3 nature damage to target hero or ally and heals 3 damage from target hero or ally. Use only on your turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (2), Flip Kayleitha: While Kayleitha is stealthed, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to her this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (3), Flip Omedus: Omedus deals shadow damage to target hero equal to 7 minus the number of cards in its controller's hand.

property.name: Rules

property.value: (3), Flip Sen'zir Beastwalker: Put a Pet card from your graveyard into your hand.

property.value: (3), Flip Ta'zo: Ta'zo deals 3 fire damage to target hero or ally. Use only on your turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (3), Flip Thangal: Ready Thangal. Use only while he's in bear form.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ongoing: Your hero is in bear form. (Has protector. Destroy this card when you strike with a weapon or play a non-Feral ability.) When Bear Form is destroyed, you may pay (2). If you do, put it into your hand at end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ongoing: When an ally is destroyed, its controller may search his deck for an ally card with the same name and put it into play exhausted.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attach to target ally and exhaust it. Ongoing: Attached ally can't ready during its controller's ready step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ongoing: When your hero is dealt combat damage while in bear form, you may pay (1). If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your hero heals 10 damage from target hero or ally.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attach to target ally. Ongoing: Attached ally has +2 ATK and +2 health.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your hero has +1 ATK this turn. Ongoing: Your hero is in bear form. (Has protector. Destroy this card when you strike with a weapon or play a non-Feral ability.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ongoing: Each of your armor has +1 DEF while your hero is in bear form.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one: Your hero deals 3 nature damage to target hero or ally; or your hero heals 3 damage from target hero or ally.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Restoration Hero Required You pay (5) less to play your next card this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Feral Hero Required Ongoing: While your hero is in bear form or cat form, it has +2 ATK while attacking.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attach to target ally, and your hero heals 2 damage from it. Ongoing: At the end of each turn, your hero heals 1 damage from attached ally.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your hero deals 5 arcane damage to target hero or ally. Draw a card.

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your hero deals 1 arcane damage to target hero or ally. Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ongoing: If your hero would deal ranged damage, it deals that amount of damage plus 1 instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Beast Mastery Hero Required Target Pet has +3 ATK this turn. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to it this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top four cards of your deck. Put one into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attach to target opposing hero or ally. Ongoing: Allies in your party have +1 ATK while attacking attached character.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ongoing: Your Pets have +2 ATK and +2 health.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your hero deals 2 ranged damage to each of up to three target heroes and/or allies.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Old Bones can protect your hero.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you strike with a Ranged weapon this turn, you may pay (1). If you do, ready that weapon and your hero.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target ally has +3 ATK this turn. Target ally has -3 ATK this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Activate]: Allies in your party have +2 ATK while attacking this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, look at the top card of your deck. You may put it on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attach to target hero, and its controller draws a card. Ongoing: Attached hero's controller's maximum hand size is increased by three.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw a card. If your hero is defending, remove all attackers from combat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Players can't draw cards this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Frost Hero Required Remove Cold Snap from the game. Put up to X Frost ability cards with different names from your graveyard into your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your hero deals 2 fire damage to target hero or ally.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attach to target hero or ally, and your hero deals 4 fire damage to it. Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 fire damage to attached character.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your hero deals 3 fire damage to each opposing hero and ally.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your hero deals 1 frost damage to each opposing hero and ally. A character dealt damage this way can't attack this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your hero deals 3 frost damage to target hero or ally. A character dealt damage this way can't attack this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ongoing: (1), Destroy Mana Agate: Draw two cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attach to target ally. Attached ally can't attack or protect, loses all powers, and is a Sheep.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fire Hero Required Attach to target hero or ally, and your hero deals 6 fire damage to it. Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 2 fire damage to attached character.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ongoing: Opposing allies can't attack heroes or allies in your party unless their controller pays (1) for each attacker.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ongoing: If your hero would deal fire damage, it deals double that amount of damage instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attach to target hero or ally. Ongoing: Attached character has +1 ATK while attacking.

property.value: Attach to target hero or ally in your party. Ongoing: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to and dealt by attached character. At end of turn, destroy Blessing of Protection.

property.value: Attach to target hero or ally. Ongoing: Attached character has '[Activate]: Draw a card.'

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy any number of abilities attached to target friendly hero or ally.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ongoing: If a hero or ally in your party would be dealt damage, prevent 1 of that damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy any number of abilities attached to your hero. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to your hero this turn. Your hero can't be targeted by opponents this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exhaust target hero or ally. It can't ready during its controller's next ready step. Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your hero heals 5 damage from target hero or ally. Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protection Hero Required Prevent the next 5 damage that would be dealt to your hero by target hero or ally this turn. When damage is prevented this way, your hero deals that amount of holy damage to that character.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ongoing: When a hero or ally in your party is dealt combat damage, it deals 1 holy damage to the source of that combat damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ongoing: Your hero has protector. When your hero protects, it heals 1 damage from itself.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ongoing: When your hero deals combat damage with a weapon, it heals 2 damage from itself. (1), Destroy Seal of Light: Your hero heals 4 damage from itself.

property.value: Your hero deals 2 shadow damage to target hero or ally. Its controller discards a card for each damage dealt.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each opponent puts three allies from his party into their owners' hands.

property.value: Put target ally card from your graveyard into play if its cost is less than or equal to the number of resources you have.

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to play Eviscerate, remove up to five Combo cards in your graveyard from the game. Your hero deals X melee damage to target hero or ally, where X is 2 plus the number of Combo cards removed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to play Expose Armor, remove up to five Combo cards in your graveyard from the game. Destroy X target armor, where X is the number of Combo cards removed.

property.value: Exhaust target hero or ally. It can't ready during its controller's next ready step.

property.value: Your hero deals X melee damage to target hero or ally, where X is 1 plus the ATK of one of your Melee weapons.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ongoing: Your hero is stealthed. (Can't protect against it. Destroy this card when your hero deals damage.) When Stealth is destroyed, you may pay (2). If you do, put it into your hand at end of turn.

property.name: Rules
